post.body: Thanks, Andy! We idiot golfers need to stick together. Played every big course in the US, but haven't done St. Andrews yet.
UT looked awesome. Really well-coached. Peyton vs LT? Should be a good game.
What's your game today? Yesterday's games were great.
Well, that's one way to get talked about.
Is there ANOTHER Steve Miller out there? Little KISS rocked and so did we! HNY Terry.
I'm trying to figure out if it's on the upbeat or downbeat.
Hey, I finally found the REALKathleen Hessert! Happy New Year from Kelly's Dad.
I nominate @AlohaArleen for a Shorty Award in #personal because she keeps Twitter personal, real, and FUN!
BTW, what planet did Sproles come from?
Just walked our two border terrors. Still pretty cold in Seattle.
Responding to Eben Pagan's challenge while listening to Duffy's "Mercy." http://is.gd/euWv
Running some diagnostics on my Mom's old PowerBook before she flies back to Palm Springs.
Slept in this morning, so I'm behind. Good morning from Seattle.
http://twitpic.com/z5ki
Looks like Ole Miss has TT's number.
I know others hv tweeted about this, but if u haven't read Tony Hsieh's Poker, Business, & Life post, u shud http://is.gd/enUT
My wife wants to learn about Twitter for the New Year.
Seattle Dish Network doesn't hv Rose Bowl becuz of dispute with local ABC! Stupid stupid stupid.
Retweeting @copyblogger: How to Use Twitter to Grow Your Business - http://tinyurl.com/8c5lc6
Just put my final post for 2008 on my blog: http://www.twohatmarketing.com.
